name: Martial Training

otherRequirements: Martial Level Progression of 0, Rank 1 Weapon Proficiency

description: You learn 2 Basic Martial Maneuvers of one type of your choice.

name: Advanced Martial Training
description: Your [MARTIAL LEVEL] increases by 1 and you can learn 1 additional Basic Martial Maneuver

name: Warrior
description: Your [MARTIAL LEVEL] increases by 1 and you can learn 1 additional Basic Martial Maneuver. Additionally you can choose a second type of Martial Maneuvers and you can now also learn Maneuvers of that type.

name: Trained Warrior
description: Your [MARTIAL LEVEL] increases by 1 and can learn 1 additional Basic Martial Maneuver. At [LEVEL] 12 your level increases 1 further and you can now also learn 1 Advanced Martial Maneuver.

name: Versitile Warrior
description: Choose one Martial Maneuver Type, you can now also learn maneuvers of that type. If you take this Perk again the [INT] requirement increases by 2.

name: Weapon Finesse
description: When you make a Weapon Attack with a light or versatile weapon you can use half of your [AGI] instead of your [STR] for determining your Martial Damage.

name: Superior Weapon Finesse
description: When you make a Weapon Attack with a light or versatile weapon you can use three-quaters of your [AGI] instead of your [STR] for determining your Martial Damage.

name: Lightning Attacks
description: After you make a Weapon Attack that is not a Lighting Attack, the next Weapon Attack can be a lightning Attack and is made at 1 [AP] less (min of 1 [AP]).

name: Unrelenting
description: When a target that you can see moves out of your reach, you can use your reaction to try and prevent their escape. Make a [STR] or [AGI] [MARTIAL TEST] against the targets [DODGE] and on a Success the Targets movement is wasted. You can use this feature even if the target does not provoke an opportunity attack.

name: Graze
description: When missing a [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK], you can still deal physical damage to the target equal to your [STR].

name: Momentum
description: When wielding a melee weapon that has the heavy property, your next melee attack deals extra damage for each meter you moved directly towards the target (rounded down, max 20).

name: Improved Heavy Attack
description: When making a heavy Weapon Attack instead of increasing the damage by ([STR]/3) * d12 it now does by ([STR]/2) * d12.

name: Point blank shot
description: When making a ranged weapon Attack, when that target is within half range of the first range, you gain a +1 bonus to [ATTACK] and damage. This bonus increases to +2 when you reach [LEVEL] 7.

name: Rapid Reload
description: When reloading a weapon it now costs 1 [AP] less (canâ€™t be less than 1 [AP]).

name: Careful Shot
description: At the start of your Turn, you can choose to reduce your [MP] to 0 and choose to make Careful Shots, during which your [DODGE] is reduced by 5, but every [RANGED ATTACK] gains a +3 bonus to the [ATTACK].

name: Impossible Precision
description: Any [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] you make ignores cover bonuses.

name: Expert Dual Wielder
description: When performing a Dual-wield attack you can now make an unlimited amount of follow-up attacks with a light weapon at -1 [AP] as long as you follow the same restrictions and always switch to a different weapon when attacking. This can not be combined with the Lightning Attack Perk.

name: Flexible Dual Wielder
description: You can now use the Dual-wield attack even if one of your weapons does not have the light property, but it cannot have the two-handed property.

name: Master Dual Wielder
description: When performing a Dual-wield attack it is now a single 2 [AP] Ability where you make an [ATTACK] 2 times that can then also benefit from the Expert Dual Wielder Perk.

name: Improved Critical
description: For your [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] and [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] the required unmodified roll required for a critical hit is reduced by 1.

name: Superior Critical
description: When you score a critical hit with a [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] and [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], you can roll the damage dice 1 additional time.

name: Devastating Critical
description: When you score a critical hit with a [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] and [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], you can grant your target one of the following status effects of your choice for 1 round: [BLINDED], [SILENCED], [BLEEDING I] equal to  2d6 + [MARTIAL LEVEL], [STUNNED I], [CRIPPLED I]
